United States of America

SURNAME: SMITH
GIVEN NAMES: JOHN MICHAEL  
NATIONALITY: USA
DATE OF BIRTH: 15 JAN 1985
PLACE OF BIRTH: NEW YORK, NY

PASSPORT NO: 123456789
DATE OF ISSUE: 10 MAY 2020  
DATE OF EXPIRATION: 10 MAY 2030
ISSUING AUTHORITY: United States Department of State

SEX: M
HEIGHT: 5'10"
EYES: BROWN

This passport contains 32 pages.
The Secretary of State of the United States hereby requests
all whom it may concern to permit the citizen/national of the
United States named herein to pass without delay or hindrance
and in case of need to give all lawful aid and protection.
